trans-unit.source: Specifies the direction in which the system arranges minimized windows.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a direção na qual o sistema organiza as janelas minimizadas.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ArrangeDirection%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class.
trans-unit.target: Essa enumeração é usada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ArrangeDirection%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> classe.

trans-unit.source: Arranged vertically, from top to bottom.
trans-unit.target: Organizados verticalmente, de cima para baixo.

trans-unit.source: Valid with the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopLeft" /> and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Válido com os valores de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopLeft" /> e <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" />.

trans-unit.source: Arranged horizontally, from left to right.
trans-unit.target: Organizados horizontalmente, da esquerda para a direita.

trans-unit.source: Valid with the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomRight" /> and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Válido com os valores de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomRight" /> e <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" />.

trans-unit.source: Arranged horizontally, from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Organizados horizontalmente, da direita para a esquerda.

trans-unit.source: Valid with the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomLeft" /> and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopLeft" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Válido com os valores de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomLeft" /> e <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopLeft" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" />.

trans-unit.source: Arranged vertically, from bottom to top.
trans-unit.target: Organizados verticalmente, de baixo para cima.

trans-unit.source: Valid with the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomLeft" /> and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomRight" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Válido com os valores de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomLeft" /> e <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomRight" /><see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition" />.
